name: Libre Bodoni
description: The Libre Bodoni fonts are based on the 19th century Morris Fuller Benton's ATF design, but specifically adapted for today's web requirements. They are a perfect choice for everything related to elegance, style, luxury and fashion. Libre Bodoni currently features four styles: Regular, Italic, Bold and Bold Italic. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/Libre-Bodoni .
author: Pablo Impallari, Rodrigo Fuenzalida
